::Magmatron::

    "Like-Like," He said. "Can you fly? If so goody-goody, g=
o to these cordinates if you can. If not then go to these cordinates."
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: Soulstice Omega 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, February 20, 2001 1:54 AM
  Subject: Re: Alliance =
Proposal


  Like-Like was still sitting in one spot, sleeping, and droolin=
g. He was woken up by Magmatron's comm link call. He howls in rage, but the=
n thinks about what M<agmatron may need and replies.

  Like-Like: Where is=
 Master at? Like-Like will help...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    F=
rom: dachande 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, February 1=
9, 2001 11:29 PM
    Subject: Re: Alliance Proposal


    ::Magmatron::

  =
      "Zardus, you have my full attention," He said. "What do you want us t=
o do? [To the ship and all Destrons] We are attacking Hell Beast."

    ::D=
estrons::

        They all went to the gun room and got some powerful weap=
ons. Dachande loaded up and went to the front. Battera did the same. The Ni=
ghtmares did and got ready for full on combat. Praetorian got ready, as wel=
l as Jynx.

    ::Vukodlak::

        His time of awakening was coming clos=
e. He would destroy what ever was left of the Autobots and the Decepticons.=

        
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: Yanshosh@... =

      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Monday, February 19, 2001 10=
:55 PM
      Subject: Re: Alliance Proposal


      ::Killfest/Zardus/FZ/Bl=
oodystrike::

      Killfest enters the conference room in time to hear Dri=
llBit and 
      Darkfate talking about the Alliance's proposal. He nods.

=
      "Yes, I would enjoy a chance at battle against Hell Beast," he says, =

      waiting for Zardus to reply to DarkFate.
      ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Zardus taps a few buttons, making the channel that he =
and Darkfate 
      were on secure.

      "My scanners detect only two of =
his Predacons in your area," he says 
      to Darkfate, "I have a potentia=
l mutiny in my base, so I don't know 
      if I can send troops."

      H=
e frowns, noticing something on the scanner reports of the CF. 
      Unitr=
on's signature was there, but Unitron was also in the base..

      "I have=
 to go for a few moments," he says to Darkfate, "There's 
      something I=
 need to take care of."

      He closes the channel and turns to FZ.

    =
  "Go to the CF and oversee that everything is going fine. There's 
      s=
omething up."

      FZ nods, turning around and walking out of the bridge.=
 He exits the 
      Iron Fist and blasts off, heading toward the CF at top=
 speed.

      Zardus turns back in his chair, remembering something. The D=
estrons! 
      They were allies of the Alliance as well..

      "Zardus t=
o Magmatron," he says into his comm, opening a channel to 
      Magmatron,=
 "My troops are currently attacking Hell Beast's base. If 
      you could =
aid us there, or perhaps attack his troops at the 
      Cybertronian Fire,=
 it would be greatly appreciated and repaid. I 
      await your answer."

=
      He closes the channel, sending a transmission to Darkfate again. "I'm=
 
      sending a bot to help you out. That's all I can muster at the momen=
t 
      though."

      He taps a few buttons, sending Bloodystrike an ord=
er.
      ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
      Bloodystrike sighs, chang=
ing course half-way to the Alliance base and 
      heading for the Black F=
ortress instead.




      --- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
      =
> (There will be mass delays for any posting today from me, for two 
      =
reasons.  
      > My brother has a friend over and they plan on the comput=
ers a lot, 
      and I'm 
      > playing Smackdown! 2 quite a bit on the =
ol' playstation)
      > 
      > Vehement/Shockwave/Reflector/Sun Crusher/=
Unicron/The Protectobots:
      > 
      > 
      > 
      > 
      > Vehem=
ent was lying on the ground, but kept his blood red optics 
      looking a=
t 
      > the sun as the solar technology in them absorbed great amounts o=
f 
      energy, his 
      > overall power level back up to 65% again.  
 =
     > 
      > He stood, firing off a wide blast of optic energy, intercep=
ting 
      three charges 
      > heading for Sun Crusher.  Twenty five bl=
asts struck Vehement's 
      armor, not 
      > penetrating it or even co=
ming close to it.
      > 
      > The ginormous robot stretched an arm wit=
h a sick smile.  His left 
      arm 
      > transformed into a wide canno=
n as a eight foot long broadsword 
      appeared in 
      > his right han=
d.
      > 
      > Raising the cannon of an arm, he launching two energy-s=
ignature 
      seeking 
      > missiles at Iron Raptor's abdomen.
      >=
 
      > Moving the point of the broadsword to point at Condor, a fire bal=
l 
      errupting 
      > from it at the enemy's chest.
      > 
      > =
---
      > 
      > Reflector felt a surge of power, that told him Unicron=
 was 
      siphoning more 
      > power to him.  Getting up and ignoring =
the pain as twenty-three 
      shots dug 
      > into his body, he raised=
 an arm, launching two missile at IRIS from 
      his wrist 
      > canno=
n.
      > 
      > ---
      > 
      > Sun Crusher rolled to the left, th=
e explosions from the charge 
      sending him 
      > flipping through t=
he air, slamming painfully to his legs, almost 
      causing him 
      > =
to crash to the ground.  "That's it, heathens," he said, spitting 
      me=
ch-fluid 
      > into the burnt grass before him, "you want to die painful=
ly, be my 
      guest."
      > 
      > With that, his shaped twisted int=
o the form of a tank, Sun Crusher 
      the hover 
      > tank bringing a=
 long barrel to point at the CF, launching three 
      explosive 
      > =
shells from the bowels of the tank.
      > 
      > ---
      > 
      > U=
nicron, still disguised as Unitron, activated a comm. link to all 
      Al=
liance 
      > members at the scene of the Cybertronian Fire.  
      > 
 =
     > "All Alliance warriors, this is Unitron," his voice sounding 
      =
exactly like 
      > Unitron's, his appearance the same as well, "I receiv=
ed orders from 
      Zardus, 
      > leave everyone alone and focus solel=
y on crippling the Cybertronian 
      Fire 
      > beyond repair.  Then m=
ake a full retreat."
      > 
      > =3D=3D=3D
      > 
      > Shockwave =
was flying at his top speed for atmospheric conditions in 
      his space =

      > fighter mode, arming all his weapons.  The cause would not fall.
 =
     > 
      > =3D=3D=3D
      > 
      > Hot Spot looked at two CR chambe=
rs, noticing First Aid and Blades 
      were still 
      > badly damaged.=
  He then looked over to Groove and Streetwise.
      > 
      > "Blades is=
 closer to being repaired.  I will stay here and have him 
      go out to =

      > help you while you attack the enemies outside.
      > 
      > Gr=
oove and Streetwise nodded, runinng as fast as they could for 
      their =
nearest 
      > exit out of the ship that wasn't a large hole in the ship.=
